gui.verhack.changelog.line1: - Aimbot Rework: Smoothness slider & FOV check
gui.verhack.changelog.line2: - Aimbot Rework: Visibility check & Glow effects
gui.verhack.changelog.line3: - X-Ray Upgrade: Custom ore colors & Bigger radius
gui.verhack.changelog.line7: - Misc category populated with utility modules
gui.verhack.changelog.line8: - Performance optimizations for X-Ray and Rendering
gui.verhack.changelog.line10: - Fixed various stuttering issues in combat modules
